column5: We are offering our 3Br3Ba home. The home is clean and spacious. Accommodates up to 9 guests • King bed in the master • Full with twin bunk in upstairs room • Queen Bed in downstairs room • Spare twin mattress • Twin sized Aerobed  Our home is located in a central location: West Plano between Preston Rd & Coit Ave just off of Plano Parkway and 5 minutes from George Bush Turnpike (I35) perfect location for family who is visiting or for professional coming for temporary work.
